title: Underprice , low nonce and incorrect hashrate
body:
Hi, I wonder if you could please help me

#### System information

Geth version: 1.9.7
OS & Version: Ubuntu 18.04 .. 8 RX580 GPUs  Ethermine 16 as the last version generate a memory error
type: Solo mine

#### Expected behaviour
to be able to do solo mine

#### Actual behaviour
the miner fail to summit submit the hashrate == I could not find how to solve it
All the transaction is under price == I use all the big and small values but not changes

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
One terminal run Geth as  sudo geth -rpc --syncmode "full" --cache "4096" --maxpeers "25" --gcmode "full" --identity "My_mine" --metrics --rpcapi="db,eth,net,web3,personal,debug" --vmdebug

Second terminal run attach console and run the eth.mine(0)

Third terminal run ethemine using -P http:/127.0.0.1:8545 -G

####
I could not find any solution either using command nor internet information

thanks in advance for your help

Hi There, 

looking for being able to process a transactions in my Rig.
I am still searching but I could not find any clear information about how to set the configuration for Geth Solo Mining without being rejected by underprice or low nonce
####Facts  

*Geth, verbosity(6) show that all the transaction is under pricing. Then Geth the transaction is reject. 
*I can see that the transaction in Geth match with the Jobs states in Ethminer.
*I am a Solo Miner, my cost is less that the Pool, that is my advantage and it is why I could take the lower gas transactions. 

Could you please help me?

thanks

Hi, 
there is part of my toml file

----------------------------
[Eth]
NetworkId = 1
SyncMode = "full"
NoPruning = false
NoPrefetch = false
LightPeers = 0
UltraLightFraction = 75
DatabaseCache = 4096
DatabaseFreezer = ""
TrieCleanCache = 2048
TrieDirtyCache = 2048
TrieTimeout = 3600000000000
EnablePreimageRecording = true
EWASMInterpreter = ""
EVMInterpreter = ""

[Eth.Miner]
Etherbase = "0x000000000=my wallet"
GasFloor = 8000000
GasCeil = 1000000000000000000
GasPrice = 1000000000
Recommit = 3000000000
Noverify = false

[Eth.Ethash]
CacheDir = "ethash"
CachesInMem = 2
CachesOnDisk = 3
DatasetDir = "/home/caw/.ethash"
DatasetsInMem = 1
DatasetsOnDisk = 2
PowMode = 0

[Eth.TxPool]
Locals = []
NoLocals = false
Journal = "transactions.rlp"
Rejournal = 3600000000000
PriceLimit = 1
PriceBump = 10
AccountSlots = 16
GlobalSlots = 4096
AccountQueue = 64
GlobalQueue = 1024
Lifetime = 10800000000000

[Eth.GPO]
Blocks = 10
Percentile = 40

[Shh]
MaxMessageSize = 1048576
MinimumAcceptedPOW = 2e-01
RestrictConnectionBetweenLightClients = true

[Node]
UserIdent = "Happy_caw"
DataDir = "/home/caw/.ethereum"
omitempty = ""
IPCPath = "geth.ipc"
HTTPHost = "127.0.0.1"
HTTPPort = 8545
HTTPVirtualHosts = ["localhost"]
HTTPModules = ["db", "eth", "net", "web3", "personal", "debug"] WSPort = 8546 WSModules = ["net", "web3", "eth", "shh"] GraphQLPort = 8547 GraphQLVirtualHosts = ["localhost"]

[Node.P2P]
MaxPeers = 25
NoDiscovery = false

BootstrapNodes = ......

.........

StaticNodes = []
TrustedNodes = []
ListenAddr = ":30303"
EnableMsgEvents = false

[Node.HTTPTimeouts]
ReadTimeout = 30000000000
WriteTimeout = 30000000000
IdleTimeout = 120000000000

there is the screenshot of Geth

as you see, all is underpriced
 is it normal?

these are my settings

[Eth.Miner]
Etherbase = "my wallet "
GasFloor = 1000000
GasCeil = 999999999999
GasPrice =1000000
Recommit = 3000000000
Noverify = false

[Eth.Ethash]
CacheDir = "ethash"
CachesInMem = 2
CachesOnDisk = 3
DatasetDir = "/home/caw/.ethash"
DatasetsInMem = 1
DatasetsOnDisk = 2
PowMode = 0

[Eth.TxPool]
Locals = []
NoLocals = false
Journal = "transactions.rlp"
Rejournal = 3600000000000
PriceLimit = 1
PriceBump = 10
AccountSlots = 16
GlobalSlots = 4096
AccountQueue = 64
GlobalQueue = 1024
Lifetime = 10800000000000

Geth not receive the hashrate form a miner.

the issue of the price is because the default values on geth, not let go lower
